name: Bugworld: Online
storyline:
BUGWORLD:ONLINE is a social MMO featuring an advanced lobby system and Skattle Royale battlegrounds. Create your own Mane or make your own Mitch and meet with other Buglings on a fully persistent online server.
Create Your Mane & Make Your Mitch
Create your own custom character from either the Mitch or Mane class with full color customization. Create your unique Mane or Mitch as your avatar in BUGWORLD.
The Mariot*
Meet up with other Buglings in a fully interactive Burbank Airport Mariot*. Explore conference rooms and floors with other Buglings and use their social features. Team up for PVE and search for the pages of the Bug Sabre.
Events
Be there at the Mariot for timed server events, like the Bug Mane Kokopelli concert, to enjoy with other Buglings.
Skattle Royale At The Cootiedome
Face off against other Manes and Mitches in the massive Cootiedome, the stadium themed after chain restaurant Cooties. Buglings face off until there's only one Bugling standing, in areas like Kokopelli Kitchens, Buzz-Buzz Bathrooms, The Bug Bar, and Skittle-Skattle Seating.

*BUGWORLD:ONLINE is not related to or endorsed by Marriott International, Inc. In-game hotel name subject to change abruptly without notice.
MATURE CONTENT DESCRIPTION
The developers describe the content like this:

BUGWORLD:ONLINE is an online, community-based multiplayer game with social features. As such, we can't fully control what other online players do and say. We will be doing content moderation as best we can, but be warned.

The Skattle Royale features gunplay and cartoon violence.
summary: Bugworld: Online is a social MMO with an advanced Lobby featureset and competitive Skattle Royale. Make your Mitch or Create Your Mane and interact with other Buglings. Skittle skattle!
